articles.title: Baltimore Ravens LB Jaylon Ferguson dies at age 26
articles.description: Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson has died at the age of 26, the team announced. The former third-round pick had played three seasons in Baltimore.
articles.content:
OWINGS MILLS, Md. -- Baltimore Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson died at the age of 26, the team announced Wednesday.
No cause of death was given.

articles.title: Brooks Koepka withdraws from PGA Tour's Travelers Championship after news he will join LIV Golf Invitational Series
